## Source: ossf-package-analysis (02276d47d8678bd06955da62ecdcb763c5ae107ba0b8674171a97c672ed79be0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'textharmony' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
